meteringrange: Real-time evaluative metering with image sensor: Metering range: EV 0 - EV 20 (At 73°F/23°C, 50mm f/1.4 lens, ISO 100) AE lock possible The active metering time can be changed.
gigabitethernet: The RJ-45 jack is not built-in and is only available via the Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E7A
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 1/60 sec., X-sync at 1/200 sec. 1/8000 to 30 sec., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.) Shutter speed's control range can be set with a Custom Function.
exposurecompensation: Manual: ±5 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments AEB: ±3 stops in 1/3 or 1/2-stop increments
imageprotection: Erase protection can be applied or canceled for a single image, all images in a folder or all images in the card
imagetype: Still Image: JPEG, RAW (14-bit Canon Original), M-RAW, S-RAW, RAW+JPEG, M-RAW+JPEG, S-RAW+JPEG Video: MOV (Image data: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC; Audio: Linear PCM)
videoisorange: P, Av, and Bulb: Automatically set within ISO 100 - 12800, expandable to H (equivalent to ISO 25600) - A+ and Tv: Automatically set within ISO 100 - 12800, - M: Auto ISO (automatically set within ISO 100 - 12800), ISO 100 - 12800 set manually (in 1/3- or whole-stop increments), expandable to H (equivalent to ISO 16000/20000/25600)
drivemodes: Single, High-speed continuous, Low-speed continuous, Silent Single Shooting and Self-timer (10 sec. self-timer/remote control, or 2-sec. self-timer/remote control)
batterycheck: Automatic battery check when the power switch is turned on: Displayed in 6 levels:
externalflashsettings: The camera can set the following with Speedlite 600EX-RT, 580EX II, 430EX II, 320EX, 270EX II, or 270EX: (1) External flash control (2) Flash Custom Function setting
afareaandafpointselection: AF area used in horizontal/vertical (grip up or down) shooting and the manually-selected AF point position can be set separately
picturestyle: Auto, Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Defined 1-3
afpointselection: 1. Single-point AF (Manual selection) 2. Auto selection 61-Point AF 3. Single-point Spot AF (Manual selection) 4. AF point expansion (Manual selection, 4 points: Up, down, left, and right) 5. AF point expansion (Manual selection, surrounding 8 points) 6. Zone AF (Manual zone selection)
viewfindermirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmission: reflection ratio of 40:60,
exposurecontrol: (1) Scene Intelligent Auto (2) Program AE (shiftable) (3) Shutter-priority AE (Safety shift possible) (4) Aperture-priority AE (Safety shift possible) (5) Manual exposure * The metering mode can be specified with a Custom Function. (6) Bulb (7) E-TTL II autoflash program AE * Evaluative metering, Averaged metering
weight: Approx. 33.5 oz. / 950g (Based on CIPA standards) Approx. 30.3 oz./ 860g (Body only)
afassistbeam: (1) Enable With an EOS-dedicated Speedlite, AF-assist beam is emitted automatically when necessary. (2) Disable (3) IR AF assist beam only * No AF-assist beam with flash bursts.
shutterlagtime: 1) During SW-1 ON, time lag between SW-2 ON and start of exposure: Approx. 0.059 sec. 2) Time lag between simultaneous SW-1/SW-2 ON and start of exposure: Approx. 0.2 sec
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: ISO 100-25600 (in 1/3-stop or whole-stop increments) ISO speed expansion possible to ISO 50, 51200, and 102400. For [Highlight tone priority], the settable ISO speed range will be 200-25600. ISO speed safety shift possible with Custom Function.
aelock: (1) Auto AE lock In the One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering, AE lock takes effect when focus is achieved. (2) Manual AE lock With AE lock button. (AE lock is updated each time you press the button.) Enabled in all metering modes.
mymenuregistration: Up to six top-tier menu options and Custom Function settings can be registered
colortemperaturecompensation: Blue/amber bias: ±9 levels Magenta/green bias: ±9 levels * Corrected in reference to the current WB mode's color temperature
highlightalert: With single-image display (Info.) and single-image display, overexposed highlight areas will blink
imagesensortype: High-sensitivity, high-resolution, large single-plate CMOS sensor
shootingmodes: Still photo shooting and video shooting
compatibleflash: E-TTL II autoflash with all EX Series Speedlites
camerausersettings: Current camera settings can be registered to C1, C2 and C3 on the Mode Dial (Automatic registration update is possible)
powersaving: Power turns off after the set time (1, 2, 4, 8, 15 or 30 minutes) of non-operation elapses.
interfacelanguages: 25 (English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Greek, Russian, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, 15/15 Romanian, Ukraine, Turkish, Arabic, Thai, Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 AC power can be supplied with the AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II Compatible with UDMA CF cards SD, SDHC, and SDXC Memory Cards
customfunctions: 13 Custom Functions settable with the camera
recordingformat: Design Rule for Camera File System 2.0 and EXIF 2.3
filesize: (1) Large: Approx. 22.10 Megapixels (5760 x 3840) (2) Medium: Approx. 9.80 Megapixels (3840 x 2560) (3) S1 (Small 1): Approx. 5.50 Megapixels (2880 x 1920) (4) S2 (Small 2): Approx. 2.50 Megapixels (1920 x 1280) (5) S3 (Small 3): Approx. 350,000 Pixels (720 x 480) (6) RAW: Approx. 22.10 Megapixels (5760 x 3840) (7) M-RAW: Approx. 10.50 Megapixels (3960 x 2640) (8) S-RAW: Approx. 5.50 Megapixels (2880 x 1920) Exact file sizes depend the subject, ISO speed, Picture style et
autofocustype: TTL Secondary image registration, phase detection
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual reset Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card
focusing: (1) Autofocus (One-Shot AF) - Live mode (One-point, contrast AF. Switching to another AF point possible.)- Face detection Live mode (Face detection, contrast AF. Face selectable.) - Quick mode (61-point, phase-difference AF, same as normal shooting.) (2) Manual focus
brightnessadjustment: Auto: Brightness adjusted automatically by the light sensor * Adjustable to one of three levels: Darker, Standard, Brighter Manual: Adjustable to one of seven brightness levels
shuttertype: Vertical-travel, mechanical, focal-plane shutter with all speeds electronically-controlled
audiovideooutterminal: (1) Video OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL selectable (2) mini-HDMI OUT terminal
simultaneousrecording: The image-recording quality can be selected in any combination of the three RAW and eight JPEG recording quality settings.
focusingmodes: Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
extensionsystemterminal: For connection to WFT-E7A (WFT) and GP-E2 (GPS)
viewfindercoverage: Approx. 100% vertically and horizontally (At approx. 21mm eyepoint)
selectedafpointdisplay: Displayed in viewfinder with transparent LCD and on LCD panel
videofilesize: Recording Sizes: 1920 x 1080 (Full HD), 1280 x 720 and 640 x 480
videofileformat: MPEG-4 AVC / H.264 Variable (averaged) bit rate
meteringmodes: Real-time Evaluative metering with the image sensor
printableimages: RAW and JPEG images complying to Design rule for Camera File System
continuousshootingspeed: High-speed: Maximum approx. 6.0 shots/sec. Low-speed: Maximum approx. 3.0 shots/sec. Silent continuous shooting: Maximum approx. 3.0 shots/sec.
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the image sensor
quickcontrolfunction: The following functions can be set: Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed, exposure compensation, AEB, flash exposure compensation, AF point selection (including AF area selection modes), Picture Style, White Balance, WB Correction, metering mode, Auto Lighting Optimizer, recording function switching, image-recording quality, AF mode, drive mode, and Custom Controls (camera controls/buttons customization).
imageerase: Erase a single image, selected images, all images in a folder, all images in a card or erase only unprotected images
viewfinderinformation: AF information (AF point, focus confirmation, AF status indicator) Exposure information (Shutter speed, aperture, ISO speed (always displayed), AE lock, exposure level, exposure warning) Flash information (Flash ready, flash exposure compensation, high-speed sync, FE lock, red-eye reduction light) Image information (Highlight tone priority (D+), maximum burst (2-digit display), card information) Battery check Composition information Warning symbol
displayformat: Single image, Single image + Image-recording quality/shooting information, histogram, 4- or 9-image index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x), rotated image (auto/manual), image jump (by 10/100 images, index screen, by shooting date, by folder), two-image comparative display, slide show (all images/selected by date/folder), star rating
maximumburst: JPEG Large/Fine: Approx. 65 shots (approx. 16270 shots) RAW: Approx. 13 shots (approx. 18 shots) RAW+JPEG Large/Fine: Approx. 7 shots (approx. 7 shots
